title: Introduction to Military History
description: Comprehensive study of military history with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.

title: Introduction to Social History
description: Examination of key concepts and methodologies in social history. Includes hands-on experience and case studies.

title: Intermediate Political History
description: Comprehensive study of political history with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.

title: Applied Social History
description: Rigorous treatment of social history theory and applications with emphasis on research methodology.

title: Advanced Social History
description: In-depth analysis of social history principles. Students will develop critical thinking and problem-solving skills.

title: Modern History
description: In-depth analysis of modern history principles. Students will develop critical thinking and problem-solving skills.

title: Advanced Cultural History
description: Interdisciplinary approach to cultural history combining theoretical knowledge with practical problem-solving.

title: Special Topics in World History
description: Rigorous treatment of world history theory and applications with emphasis on research methodology.
prerequisites: HIST 331 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Special Topics in Social History
description: Fundamental concepts and applications of social history. Designed for students pursuing careers in related fields.
prerequisites: HIST 376 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Special Topics in World History
description: In-depth analysis of world history principles. Students will develop critical thinking and problem-solving skills.
prerequisites: HIST 336 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Graduate Ancient History
description: Rigorous treatment of ancient history theory and applications with emphasis on research methodology.
prerequisites: HIST 383 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Advanced European History
description: Interdisciplinary approach to european history combining theoretical knowledge with practical problem-solving.
prerequisites: HIST 310 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Advanced American History
description: Comprehensive study of american history with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.
prerequisites: HIST 366 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Special Topics in European History
description: Rigorous treatment of european history theory and applications with emphasis on research methodology.
prerequisites: HIST 391 and senior standing or graduate status
